tagline: Unforgettable drinks‚ vibrant atmosphere‚ and endless camaraderie․ Welcome to the ultimate drinking club․
rules:
Our lobby rules
〔 So be careful who you let join; no minors‚ crashes and toxic people․ 〕

Lobby is SFW
〔 No lewd⁄ERP 〕

Avatars
〔 disruptive avatars and please keep swapping avatars to a minimum to not lag the lobby․ 〕

Disclaimers
〔 If you join this group⁄our events‚ you may or may not encounter adult themes ＆ provocative activities or content‚ and if you join our group⁄events‚ you indicate consent to view these activities or content․ 〕
infoBoard:
We're a community that plays games, socialize and do a bit of drinking songs.
We host our events Fridays and Saturdays.

Fridays are our VRC Gamenight, where we play various games that VRChat has to offer.

Saturdays are our evening event where we sitdown, play some sitdown games like spin the wheel and cards with some drinking songs throught the night.
